metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

extracted_sections.section_title: Change flat forms to fillable (Acrobat Pro)
Create multiple PDFs from multiple files

subsection_analysis.refined_text: To create an interactive form, use the Prepare Forms tool. See Create a form from an existing document.
To enable the Fill & Sign tools, from the hamburger menu (File menu in macOS) choose Save As Other > Acrobat Reader Extended PDF > Enable More Tools (includes Form Fill-in & Save).
